q: Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. 1. Dismissing speculation that he might take a job in the Barack Obama administration, possibly replacing Robert Gates as defense secretary, Colin Powell said he is not interested in a government role.
